attributes.action: Remove David Lammy from his position as MP for Tottenham.
attributes.background: Mr Lammy has demonstrated that he does not understand and respect democracy. He should be removed as MP for Tottenham. He has actively supported a petition for a 2nd referendum and spoke at a protest march on 2nd July 2016 to incite hatred again brexit supporters.

rejection.details: The UK Government and Parliament are not responsible for removing MPs from office because of their views or opinions.
